publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3616 Elaine Murray: Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association—That the Parliament congratulates Loreburn Housing Association from Dumfries and Galloway on being named by The Sunday Times as one of the top 10 companies in the United Kingdom for making a positive difference to the world and on being one of only two housing associations and one of only three Scottish companies included in its list of the top 100 Best Small Companies to Work For in the United Kingdom.

S3M-3616 Elaine Murray: Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association—That the Parliament congratulates Loreburn Housing Association from Dumfries and Galloway on being named by The Sunday Times as one of the top 10 companies in the United Kingdom for making a positive difference to the world and on being one of only two housing associations and one of only three Scottish companies included in its list of the top 100 Best Small Companies to Work For in the United Kingdom.
S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*

S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*, John Park*, Jim Hume*, Cathy Jamieson*, Hugh Henry*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, George Foulkes*
S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Des McNulty*, Trish Godman*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-3616 Congratulations to Loreburn Housing Association (lodged on 4 March 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
